title: Game Progress Route
content:
will ask what you think of him:

He seemed like an absolute fraud in a very nice coat. Frankly, I'm impressed. He's wormed his way into the most powerful position in Baldur's Gate. I can't wait to flatten him.

If you choose the first one, Karlach will give you her approval and agrees that he has always had an expensive taste. She continues to ask how anyone in the hall could fall for this charade:

Evidently not. When people are scared, they'll do whatever it takes to feel safe. People are most
